name: Naianas
startIntroPart1: I came in peace to restore life.
startIntroPart2: Life is an eternal restoration — when you use it, you can restore it.
declaringWar: Your actions anger the spirits. I declare war in their name!
attacked: You thought I was joking? Now face the wrath of the Naianas.
defeated: This is impossible... but I shall rise again, stronger than ever.
introduction: Our civilization thrives under the gaze of the gods. Witness the glory of the Naianas!
neutralHello: Greetings, traveler. What brings you here?
neutralLetsHearIt: Are you offering something of value?
neutralYes: Agreed. May this benefit us both.
hateHello: So we meet again, enemy of the Naianas.
hateYes: We accept, but we do not forget.
afterPeace: Peace is restored — but do not test us again.
tradeRequest: Your offer is being considered by Tuzuki.
